file.name: api-docs.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Products API
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /product/{productName}:
    get:
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: productName
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Describes the success or failure of the operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: "#/components/schemas/Product"
  /product/:
    post:
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/Product"
      responses:
        200:
          description: Describes the success or failure of the operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                required:
                  - status
                  - id
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                  id:
                    type: integer
components:
  schemas:
    ProductResponse:
      type: object
      required:
        - status2
        - id
      properties:
        status2:
          type: string
        id:
          type: integer
    Product:
      type: object
      required:
        - name
        - price
        - category
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        price:
          type: integer
        category:
          type: string
